items.sentence: Tom and I used to do a lot of things together.
Tom and Mary are expecting their second child.
Tom and Mary are finally going to get married.
Tom and Mary ate the whole cake by themselves.
Tom and Mary built a sand castle on the beach.
It must\'ve been difficult for Tom to do that.
I may not be able to cope with those problems.
I often think about the place where I met you.
I overslept and was not able to catch the bus.
I prefer reading books to watching television.
I saw a movie for the first time in two years.
I stayed in the car while Tom was in the bank.
She watched the children going back to school.
Thank you for not blaming me for the accident.
Tom blew his nose loudly during the oboe solo.
Tom bought a small camera to take on his trip.
Tom is the boy I told you about the other day.
Tom is the one who broke the window yesterday.
Why are you doing the dishes? Let Tom do them.
Why did you eat that without cooking it first?
Could you at least tell me where we\'re going?
In all probability, we\'ll arrive before them.
Don\'t you want to know why I didn\'t do that?
I looked everywhere, but I couldn\'t find Tom.
I have two dogs, three cats, and six chickens.
Tom is just a little bit shorter than Mary is.
Tom is looking for an easy way to lose weight.
Tom is lying down in the back seat of his car.
Tom is lying on the couch, watching a TV show.
Tom is making Mary something for her birthday.
Tom could\'ve had this job if he\'d wanted it.
Tom couldn\'t answer all of Mary\'s questions.
Tom couldn\'t live up to Mary\'s expectations.
Would you have helped me if I\'d asked you to?
Tom doesn\'t care what people think about him.
Tom doesn\'t feel much like talking right now.
Tom doesn\'t get along with his father-in-law.
I hope I\'m not the only one who\'ll be there.
I thought that system was abolished last year.
I thought your dad took away your credit card.
I told Tom that what he was doing was illegal.
I translated everything Tom wrote into French.
I tried to tell Tom, but he refused to listen.
I want an answer from you as soon as possible.
I don\'t want to know what\'s going to happen.
You should\'ve started with simpler questions.
You shouldn\'t hang out with people like that.
You shouldn\'t spend more money than you earn.
You think you know me pretty well, don\'t you?
Tom invited Mary over to his place for dinner.
